content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate the opportunity to view the apartment. May I ask what the current rental price is?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I'm sorry, I don't have a rental price set yet. I'll let you know once I have done my research. Would you like to make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Sure, I can make an offer. Based on the size of the apartment and the fact that I am a responsible and dependable tenant, I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Thank you for your offer. I will consider it. In the meantime, I have done some research on similar apartments in the area and I have a rental price in mind. Would you like to hear it?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, please go ahead and share your rental price. I would be interested to hear what you have in mind.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
